client.communication

Class ClientCommunicator

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.communication.ClientCommunicator

  • public class ClientCommunicator
extends java.lang.Object
    The Client Communicator class acts as a proxy communicator for the client when it needs to send/receive information to the server.
    Author:
    lindell

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClientCommunicator()

      Downloads the file from the server.
      GetFields_Result getFields(GetFields_Params params)
      Returns information about all of the fields for a specified project If no project is specified, this should return information about all the fields for all the projects in the system.
      GetProjects_Result getProjects(GetProjects_Params params)
      getProjects queries the server with the project information given in the wrapper class parameter and returns information about all the available projects.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClientCommunicator

        public ClientCommunicator()

    • Method Detail

      • validateUser

        public ValidateUser_Result validateUser(ValidateUser_Params params)
        ValidateUser_Result takes a wrapper class and returns a wrapper with a User object inside of it. The method queries the server to see if there is a valid user with the information provided in the parameter.
        Parameters:
        params - object of type ValidateUser_Params which is a wrapper for strings which describe the user.
        Returns:
        ValidateUser_Result, a wrapper class for a User, which is not null if the validation was successful.

      • getProjects

        public GetProjects_Result getProjects(GetProjects_Params params)
        getProjects queries the server with the project information given in the wrapper class parameter and returns information about all the available projects.
        Parameters:
        params - a wrapper class of type GetProject_Params that contains the user's name and password.
        Returns:
        GetProject_Result, a wrapper class that contains info on all current projects.

      • getSampleImage

        public GetSampleImage_Result getSampleImage(GetSampleImage_Params params)
        getSampleImage returns an image for the given project ID, provided in the parameter wrapper class
        Parameters:
        params - a wrapper class of type GetSampleImage_params that contains the username, password, and a project id.
        Returns:
        GetSampleImage_Result, a wrapper class that contains a sample image url.

      • downloadBatch

        public DownloadBatch_Result downloadBatch(DownloadBatch_Params params)
        Downloads a batch for the user to index. The parameters and return value are contained in wrapper classes.
        Parameters:
        params - wrapper class that contains the username, password and the project ID.
        Returns:
        an object of type DownloadBatch_Result that contains all the information for the batch.

      • submitBatch

        public SubmitBatch_Result submitBatch(SubmitBatch_Params params)
        Submits the batch to the server, allowing it to be searched by key word
        Parameters:
        params - wrapper class that contains all the parameters for this method.
        Returns:
        wrapper class that contains a boolean value signifying the successful or unsuccessful completion of the method call.

      • getFields

        public GetFields_Result getFields(GetFields_Params params)
        Returns information about all of the fields for a specified project If no project is specified, this should return information about all the fields for all the projects in the system.
        Parameters:
        params - Wrapper class for the input parameters. If the project_id is equal to 0, then it should return information about all the projects.
        Returns:
        wrapper class that contains an array of fields.

      • search

        public Search_Result search(Search_Params params)
        Searches the indexed records for specified strings
        Parameters:
        params - contains the specified string and the field ids to be searched
        Returns:
        returns a wrapper containing a list of tuples with information about the results of the search.

      • downloadFile

        public DownloadFile_Result downloadFile(DownloadFile_Params params)
        Downloads the file from the server. Uses HTTP GET requests to download the data.
        Parameters:
        params - wrapper class containing the download url.
        Returns:
        wrapper class containing a byte array representing the downloaded data.
